channel.title: databricks on jdhao's digital space
channel.description: Recent content in databricks on jdhao's digital space

item.title: Running/importing External Python code in Databricks
item.description: Databricks in centered around notebooks for doing a lot of works. As a result, it is often not obvious how to run or re-use code from another notebook or Python file. In this post, I share how to do this in the Databricks platform.

item.title: How to get or set Databricks spark configuration
item.description: In this post, I summarize how to get or set a Databricks spark configuration/property.
